thread.title: Enny
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Enny

author: Enny
title: Enny
text: I heard about the 19piece deal through a friend that had recently got her furniture from there. Dana did an amazing job. I had her running around like crazy asking questions to adjust my needs. She was extremely patient and helped me out in picking what I needed. They went over pricing with me and got me qualified for financing that I didn't expect. Thank you guys !
